One Lifetime, One Earth, One Way

We are on the one way street to the end (unless there are time machines). Make it count and leave no carbon footprint behind (even if there are more earths in parallel universes or in other galaxies far far away).

I am Hannah

Making change, One variable at a time.

Hello, this is Hannah. I discovered web development while trying to create ad-less games for kids. I am on a mission to build applications that arm end users with tools to achieve their full potential.
